00025 double Matern5CF::correlation(double sqDist) const
00026 {
00027     double r = sqrt(5.0 * sqDist) / lengthScale;
00028      
00029     return ( 1.0 + r + sqr(r)/3.0 ) * exp(-r);
00030 }
00031 
00032 
00041 double Matern5CF::correlationGradient(int p, double sqDist) const
00042 {
00043         double r;
00044         assert(p>=0 && p<numberParameters);
00045 
00046     switch (p) {
00047     // Gradient with respect to length scale
00048     case 0:
00049         r = sqrt(5.0 * sqDist) / lengthScale;
00050         return (r+sqr(r)) * r / (3.0 * lengthScale) * exp(-r);
00051 
00052     // Gradient with respect to process variance
00053     case 1:
00054         return 0.0;
00055     }
00056 }
